{"id":963825014,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"5 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1685899343,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/963825014/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Smallest Value of the Rearranged Number","memory":"6.3 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    long long smallestNumber(long long num) {\n     vector<int> v;\n        int p=0;\n        if(num>0){p=1;}\n        num=abs(num);\n        if(num==0){return 0;}\n        int zero=0;\n        while(num){\n            int digit = num%10;\n            num=num/10;\n            if(digit!=0)\n            v.push_back(digit);\n            else zero++;\n        }\n        sort(v.begin(),v.end());\n        long long int ans=0;\n        if(p==1){\n            ans +=v[0];\n           if(zero>0){\n               ans= ans *(pow(10,zero));\n           }\n            for(int i=1;i<v.size();i++){\n                ans = ans*10+ v[i];\n            }\n        }\n        else{\n                 for(int i=v.size()-1;i>-1;i--){\n                     ans =ans*10+ v[i];\n                 }\n            if(zero>0){\n               ans= ans *(pow(10,zero));\n           }\n            ans = ans*(-1);\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"smallest-value-of-the-rearranged-number","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
